mapper.select: select * from( select rownum rn,d.TITLE,b.REALNAME,a.MONEY,c.item LONGTIME,a.RELEASE,NVL((select round((select sum(money) from TB_INVESTMENTLIST where TENDID=a.id)/(select money from TB_BORROW where id=a.id)*100,0) from dual),0) jin from TB_BORROW a join TB_REALNAME b on a.REALID=b.id join TB_SYSTEMCATEGORYITEM c on a.LONGTIME=c.id join TB_TENDERING d on a.id=d.id where rownum <#{end} ) e where e.rn >#{start} and RELEASE=2
